name: Any World
description:
👉🏻In Any World you will have access to several worlds and each of these worlds has its own peculiarity. One has very tall trees, the other has snow. And I named only two of the six worlds!

👉🏻You play as an alien named Ottis, who has arrived on the planet Emria. His plate is broken, and he has to explore this planet. As it turned out, there are other worlds.

👉🏻Exploring the planet and worlds, you will find various items that can somehow affect the main character (customization items, as well as very useful and rare items)
